languages.text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.
languages.original_text: До начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} пытается атаковать каждого противника, который атакует его самого или его союзников в радиусе 3 клеток от авангарда. Если для совершения этой контратаки нужно переместиться к атакующему, авангард переместится при наличии ОП. Если авангард перемещается, область действия этого эффекта перемещается вместе с ним.

traits.locale_text: Until their next turn, the Vanguard attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always attacks back when attacked.

Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move towards the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move towards the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.

Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

languages.text: До начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} пытается атаковать каждого противника, который атакует его самого или его союзников в радиусе 3 клеток от авангарда. Если для совершения этой контратаки нужно переместиться к атакующему, авангард переместится при наличии ОП. Если авангард перемещается, область действия этого эффекта перемещается вместе с ним.
languages.original_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

traits.locale_text: До начала своего следующего хода авангард атакует каждого противника, который атакует его союзников в радиусе 3 клеток от авангарда. Также до начала своего следующего хода он всегда наносит удар в ответ, если атакуют его самого.

До начала своего следующего хода авангард атакует каждого противника, который атакует его союзников в радиусе 3 клеток от авангарда. Также до начала своего следующего хода он всегда наносит удар в ответ, если атакуют его самого.

languages.text: 每当有敌人攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}或距离先锋3格以内的盟友时，先锋都会尝试对其进行反击，效果持续至先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前。如果先锋拥有足够的移动点数，则会向攻击者移动，随后进行反击。当先锋移动后，影响区域也会相应改变。
languages.original_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

traits.locale_text: 每当有敌人攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}或距离先锋3格以内的盟友时，先锋都会尝试对其进行反击，效果持续至先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前。如果先锋拥有足够的移动点数，则会向攻击者移动，随后进行反击。当先锋移动后，影响区域也会相应改变。

languages.text: Hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} intenta atacar a todos los enemigos que ataquen al vanguardia o a sus aliados en un radio de 3 casillas alrededor del vanguardia. Para realizar este contraataque, el vanguardia puede moverse hacia el atacante si tiene suficientes PM. Si el vanguardia se mueve, el área de este efecto se mueve con él.
languages.original_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

traits.locale_text: Hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} intenta atacar a todos los enemigos que ataquen al vanguardia o a sus aliados en un radio de 3 casillas alrededor del vanguardia. Para realizar este contraataque, el vanguardia puede moverse hacia el atacante si tiene suficientes PM. Si el vanguardia se mueve, el área de este efecto se mueve con él.

languages.text: Bis zu ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} versucht die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g}, Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern zu attackieren, die die Vorhut oder ihre Verbündeten angreifen. Für diesen Angriff kann sich die Vorhut auf den Gegner zubewegen, wenn sie ausreichend BP hat. Bewegt sich die Vorhut, bewegt sich auch dieser Effekt entsprechend.
languages.original_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

traits.locale_text: Bis zu ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} versucht die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g}, Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern zu attackieren, die die Vorhut oder ihre Verbündeten angreifen. Für diesen Angriff kann sich die Vorhut auf den Gegner zubewegen, wenn sie ausreichend BP hat. Bewegt sich die Vorhut, bewegt sich auch dieser Effekt entsprechend.

languages.text: Jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} tente d'attaquer chaque ennemi qui s'en prend à lui-même ou à ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. Pour effectuer cette contre-attaque, si le patrouilleur dispose d'assez de PD, il peut se déplacer vers l'assaillant. Si le patrouilleur se déplace, la zone de cet effet se déplace en conséquence.
languages.original_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} tente d'attaquer chaque ennemi qui s'en prend à lui-même ou à ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. Pour effectuer cette contre-attaque, si le patrouilleur dispose d'assez de PD, il peut se déplacer vers l'assaillant. Si le patrouilleur se déplace, la zone de cet effet se déplace en conséquence.

languages.text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は、自身または自身の周囲3マス以内にいる味方を攻撃したすべての敵に反撃を試みる。反撃を行うには、ヴァンガードが十分なMPを持っていれば、アタッカーの方へ移動することができる。ヴァンガードが移動した場合、この効果の範囲もそれに応じて移動する。
languages.original_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attempts to attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

traits.locale_text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は、自身または自身の周囲3マス以内にいる味方を攻撃したすべての敵に反撃を試みる。反撃を行うには、ヴァンガードが十分なMPを持っていれば、アタッカーの方へ移動することができる。ヴァンガードが移動した場合、この効果の範囲もそれに応じて移動する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek kendisine veya etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerine saldıran her düşmana saldırı teşebbüsünde bulunur. Öncü, yeterli HP'ye sahipse bu karşı saldırıyı yapabilmek için saldırgana doğru hareket edebilir. Öncü hareket ederse bu etkinin alanı da onunla doğru orantılı hareket eder.

To make this counter-attack, if the Vanguard has enough MP, they can move toward the attacker. If the Vanguard moves, the area of this effect moves accordingly.

Öncü, yeterli HP'ye sahipse bu karşı saldırıyı yapabilmek için saldırgana doğru hareket edebilir. Öncü hareket ederse bu etkinin alanı da onunla doğru orantılı hareket eder.

languages.text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} will try to move and attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard.

traits.locale_text: Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} will try to move and attack each enemy that attacks the Vanguard or their allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard.
